name: ballerina-integrator
description: An extension which gives a development environment for designing, developing, debugging, and testing integration solutions.

viewsWelcome.contents:
Welcome to Ballerina Integrator. You can open a folder containing a Ballerina integration or create a new integration.
[Open Ballerina Integration](command:vscode.openFolder)
[Create New Integration](command:ballerina.open.bi.new)
To learn more about how to use Ballerina Integrator in VS Code [read our docs](https://bi.docs.wso2.com/get-started/quick-start-guide/).

Welcome to Ballerina Integrator. Your current ballerina distribution is not supported. Please update to version 2201.12.3 or above.
[Update Now](command:ballerina.update-ballerina-visually)
Please restart VS Code after updating the ballerina distribution.
To learn more about how to use Ballerina Integrator in VS Code [read our docs](https://bi.docs.wso2.com/get-started/quick-start-guide/).

Welcome to Ballerina Integrator for VS Code! Ballerina distribution is required but not found. [Set up Ballerina distribution](command:ballerina.open.bi.welcome) to get started.
Explore more at [ballerina.io](https://ballerina.io)

scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
scripts.build: pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint && pnpm run postbuild
scripts.package: if [ $isPreRelease = true ]; then vsce package --no-dependencies --pre-release; else vsce package --no-dependencies; fi
scripts.rebuild: pnpm run clean && pnpm run compile && pnpm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: pnpm run copyFonts && pnpm run package && pnpm run copyVSIX
scripts.start-web: pnpm run compile-web && pnpm run test-web && pnpm run watch-ballerina
